history.content:
Dear Students,

I would like to cordially invite you to the L&S Computer Science Virtual Graduation Celebration in recognition of our newest graduates. The self-guided program includes recorded video remarks from CS Division Chair John Canny and personalized slides for each graduate. The website will include a slide that announces the name, degree and major of every eligible CS student graduating in fall ’20, spring ’21 or summer ‘21, unless the student specifically asked to be excluded or missed the campus registration deadline. 

Please consider honoring a graduate, group of graduates, or the entire L&S CS graduating class by posting a message on the L&S Computer Science Kudoboard. The L&S Computer Science Kudoboard is visible to all graduates and guests that have the link to the website. You may upload a video, photo, or GIF with a personalized message to the Class of 2021 or a specific graduate. Contributors are not required to register to post a message. We reserve the right to remove any video or message with inappropriate content.

Celebration of 2021 Computer Science Graduates
Friday, May 21st

Website opens at 9am
Click Here to Join the CS Graduation Celebration!

 

More information is listed here. 

 

Best,

 

Antoine Davis
